summary: The R.A.S. agents, Miss Bianca and Bernard, race to Australia to save a little boy and a rare golden eagle from a murderous poacher.
cast: Bob Newhart|Eva Gabor|John Candy|Tristan Rogers|Adam Ryen|George C. Scott|Wayne Robson|Douglas Seale|Frank Welker|Bernard Fox|Peter Firth|Billy Barty|Ed Gilbert|Carla Meyer|Russi Taylor|Charlie Adler|Vanna Bonta|Peter Greenwood|Mickie McGowan|Patrick Pinney|Phil Proctor
title: Los rescatadores en Cangurolandia
